title: Deals of the day- Mergers and acquisitions

content: John Malone-backed Charter Communications Inc said it would buy Bright House Networks in a $10.4 billion deal as it expands its cable network after losing out to Comcast Corp in a fight for Time Warner Cable Inc. | Video
name: Comcast Corporation
title: Charter beefs up cable muscle with Bright House deal

content: * Charter shares touch record high   (Adds analyst quote  updates shares)
name: Comcast Corporation
title: UPDATE 3-Charter beefs up cable muscle with Bright House deal

content: March 31 Cable television operator Charter Communications Inc said it would buy privately held Bright House Networks in a cash-and-stock deal valued at $10.4 billion to expand in Florida.
name: Comcast Corporation
title: CORRECTED-UPDATE 1-Charter Communications to buy Bright House in $10.4 bln deal

content: March 31 Comcast Corp  the largest U.S. cable operator  said it would form a new company with its chief financial officer  Michael Angelakis  to invest in and focus on operating growth-oriented companies both in the United States and international markets.
name: Comcast Corporation
title: Comcast to form new company with CFO Michael Angelakis

content: WASHINGTON AT&T Inc's proposed acquisition of satellite television company DirecTV is getting a smooth ride from U.S. regulators and industry rivals  who instead are directing their firepower at a merger deal between the nation's two biggest cable operators. | Video
name: Comcast Corporation
title: AT&T-DirecTV merger escapes heat as all eyes on Comcast

content: AUSTIN  Tx. As his likely rivals spent the weekend shaking hands in New Hampshire  potential Republican candidate Rand Paul flew to Texas to court the software developers and entrepreneurs who are likely to play a central role in the 2016 election.
name: Comcast Corporation
title: Rand Paul woos donors and hackers at tech conference

content: AUSTIN  Tx.  March 16 As his likely rivals spent the weekend shaking hands in New Hampshire  potential Republican candidate Rand Paul flew to Texas to court the software developers and entrepreneurs who are likely to play a central role in the 2016 election.
name: Comcast Corporation
title: Rand Paul woos donors and hackers at tech conference

content: WASHINGTON  March 13 The U.S. Federal Communications Commission on Friday paused its informal 180-day countdown to deciding the fate of two mergers - Comcast Corp's  with Time Warner Cable Inc and AT&T Inc's  with DirecTV.
name: Comcast Corporation
title: U.S. FCC pauses clock on Comcast-TWC  AT&T-DirecTV merger reviews

content: Feb 24 Comcast Corp said on Tuesday it was "optimistic" that it would close its $45 billion deal to buy Time Warner Cable Inc in early 2015.
name: Comcast Corporation
title: Comcast expects to close to Time Warner Cable deal in early 2015

content: Feb 24 Comcast Corp  the largest U.S. cable operator  posted higher fourth-quarter revenue as it added new video and high-speed internet customers.
name: Comcast Corporation
title: Comcast revenue rises as it adds video  internet customers

content: Comcast Corp and Time Warner Cable Inc have been sued for $20 billion for allegedly discriminating against African American-owned media and employing advocates such as the NAACP and the Rev. Al Sharpton to advance their bias.
name: Comcast Corporation
title: Comcast  Time Warner Cable hit with $20 billion racial bias lawsuit

content: Feb 24 Comcast Corp  the largest U.S. cable operator  posted fourth-quarter revenue that marginally beat estimates as the company added new video and high-speed internet customers.
name: Comcast Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Comcast revenue rises as it adds video  internet customers

content: Feb 23 Comcast Corp and Time Warner Cable Inc have been sued for $20 billion for allegedly discriminating against African American-owned media and employing advocates such as the NAACP and the Rev. Al Sharpton to advance their bias.
name: Comcast Corporation
title: Comcast  Time Warner Cable hit with $20 bln racial bias lawsuit

content: Feb 14 Comcast Corp said on Friday that a California Public Utilities Commission Administrative (CPUC) law judge recommended  to approve its pending $45 billion merger with Time Warner Cable and related transactions with Charter Communications.
name: Comcast Corporation
title: California Public Utilities Commission recommends to approve Comcast merger

content: WASHINGTON  Feb 17 A fight between an upstart Spanish language TV network and Comcast Corp has provided more ammunition for critics who fear Comcast would gain too much market power if its buyout of Time Warner Cable Inc  goes ahead  antitrust attorneys said.
name: Comcast Corporation
title: Comcast fight with upstart Spanish station is grist for merger foes

content: A U.S. appeals court has revived a bid by Applebee's employees in New York to pursue a wage-and-hour suit as a class action  the latest decision to find that a recent Supreme Court ruling that added a hurdle to class certification had been applied too broadly.
name: Comcast Corporation
title: Comcast ruling doesn't bar class action bid: 2nd Circuit

content: Comcast Corp  the largest U.S. cable operator  has been ordered to pay nearly $28 million in damages after a federal jury in Delaware found it infringed two fiber optics patents owned by Sprint Corp.
name: Comcast Corporation
title: Comcast to pay $27.6 mln for infringing two Sprint patents

content: WASHINGTON  Feb 4 The top U.S. communications regulator on Wednesday proposed to tighten regulations on Internet service providers by treating them more like public utilities  an approach endorsed by President Barack Obama.
name: Comcast Corporation
title: UPDATE 2-U.S. FCC chief seeks tighter regulation of Internet providers

content: A U.S. judge has rejected portions of Twenty-First Century Fox Inc's lawsuit seeking to stop Dish Network Corp from selling devices that let viewers skip over commercials when playing back shows.
name: Comcast Corporation
title: Fox loses U.S. copyright claims over Dish ad-skipper

content: WASHINGTON  Jan 9 Some 20 state attorneys general have joined the federal antitrust investigation of competing bids by Dollar General Corp and Dollar Tree Inc  to buy Family Dollar Stores  Inc  a development that potentially complicates the companies' efforts to win U.S. approval for a deal.
name: Comcast Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-20 states join U.S. antitrust probe of Family Dollar merger
